#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=See if You Are Ready for a Pet
#Text=Many kids want pets , but when they get them they see they are not ready for it .
#Text=See if you are ready for a pet and decide what type of pet you really would like to get .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Decide which pet you want .
#Text=You might want to get a dog at first , but then find out they 're too much trouble .
#Text=Read books , do your research or ask family members and friends .
#Text=You can also visit an animal shelter and see the animal you wanna get , and if you like it .
#Text=Get a toy that is the same as the pet .
#Text=This sounds silly , but it actually helps .
#Text=This will help you see the pet physically .
#Text=Also , you could pretend he/she is the real pet and act like you have to take very good care of him/her .
#Text=This kind of shows you if you are ready for a pet .
#Text=Name the toy pet .
#Text=Come up with something cute .
#Text=Act like it 's the real pet , and that you need an adorable name .
#Text=You might turn out to like the name a lot , and might name the actual pet that .
#Text=Treat it as if it were real .
#Text=Train it , feed it , and care for it greatly .
#Text=This will show your parents that you are responsible enough to have your own pet !
#Text=Make a bed for it with paper , a food bowl , and make paper foods .
#Text=You can also make a paper cage as well .
#Text=But remember , the real stuff will cost money , so do n't expect a beautiful cage and lots of toys and snacks for your pet .
#Text=Wake up early in the morning and care for it .
#Text=Give it food and take it for a walk or clean up the cage .
#Text=This will show you the real responsibilities of caring for a pet .
#Text=There can be consequences if you do n't care for your pet properly .
#Text=So , do care for him/her great , and you will be the World 's Best Owner !
#Text=Play with it in the evening and give it food .
#Text=You will have to do this with a real animal because they get hungry and bored easily .
#Text=Again , this sounds silly , but really does teach you about how having a pet is a lot of responsibility !
#Text=Go to sleep at night by putting into your bed .
#Text=Get a home or a cage for the pet and place it in there .
#Text=This also teaches you about having a pet !
#Text=When you 're done with the fake animal , enjoy your new , live pet !
#Text=Tips
#Text=Follow this for a week and see if you can do it .
#Text=If you could , it means you are ready and you can take responsibility .
#Text=If you could n't , it means pets are n't for you yet .
#Text=Show your parents and go to a pet store .
#Text=Pets can be reptiles , birds , fish , dogs , and cats .
#Text=Be prepared to create cages and food for the pet of your choice .
